title: Bloncool
author: Bloncool
content: Hello everyone! We are making a startup to create a blockchain platform for fast payments in stablecoinsb backed by real assets. The essence of the project is that everyone who has assets can issue their money (stablecoins) secured by these assets, and with this money you can pay for goods and services at the cash desks of shops, cafes, etc.We are looking for blockchain developers. The place of work is in the UAE or remotely. If you are interested in the Project, drop me a messages on Telegram @Wayfarerwin. We are open to cooperation and will be grateful for your feedback. Thank you for your attention. https://blueoceanblockchain.org/

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: The so-called "stablecoins" are just another form of altcoins. If your project has nothing to do with Bitcoin development, you should move this thread to the Altcoins section of the forum.
